00018 #ifndef TLM_SLAVE_SOCKET_H
00019 #define TLM_SLAVE_SOCKET_H
00020 
00021 //#include <systemc.h>
00022 
00023 template <typename IF> class tlm_master_socket;
00024 
00025 template <typename IF>
00026 class tlm_slave_socket : public sc_export<IF>
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   typedef IF interface_type;
00030   typedef sc_port<interface_type> port_type;
00031   typedef sc_export<interface_type> export_type;
00032   typedef tlm_master_socket<interface_type> master_socket_type;
00033 
00034   friend class tlm_master_socket<interface_type>;
00035 
00036 public:
00037   tlm_slave_socket(const char* name) :
00038     export_type(name)
00039   {
00040   }
00041 
00042   //
00043   // Bind slave socket to master socket
00044   // - Binds the port of the master socket to the export of the slave socket
00045   // - Binds the port of the slave socket to the export of the master socket
00046   //
00047   void bind(master_socket_type& s)
00048   {
00049     // master.port -> slave.export
00050     (*static_cast<port_type*>(&s))(*static_cast<export_type*>(this));
00051     // slave.port -> master.export
00052     mPort(s.mExport);
00053   }
00054 
00055   void operator() (master_socket_type& s)
00056   {
00057     bind(s);
00058   }
00059 
00060   //
00061   // Bind slave socket to slave socket (hierarchical bind)
00062   // - Binds both the export and the port
00063   //
00064   void bind(tlm_slave_socket& s)
00065   {
00066     // export
00067     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(*static_cast<export_type*>(s));
00068     // port
00069     mPort(s.mPort);
00070   }
00071 
00072   void operator() (tlm_slave_socket& s)
00073   {
00074     bind(s);
00075   }
00076 
00077   //
00078   // Bind interface to socket
00079   // - Binds the interface to the export
00080   //
00081   void bind(interface_type& ifs)
00082   {
00083     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(ifs);
00084   }
00085 
00086   void operator() (interface_type& s)
00087   {
00088     bind(s);
00089   }
00090 
00091   //
00092   // Forward to 'operator->()' of port class
00093   //
00094   interface_type* operator->()
00095   {
00096     return mPort.operator->();
00097   }
00098 
00099 protected:
00100   port_type mPort;
00101 };
00102 
00103 #endif
